title: Sun2k
author: Sun2k
content: Hello everyone,When I buy a crypto on the Binance spot market, the % gain/loss and the $ gain/loss amount do not appear like on the future market.Do you know of any application or software that does this by manually entering the purchase price and the amount of crypto purchased?Thank you for your understanding.

comments.author: spiker777
comments.body: there is an App on Play store which I think does what you need here is the link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blockfolio.cryptotracker&hl=en&gl=US&pli=1beside this you can also make your portfolio with coinmarketcap and track your losse and gains as well and that works pretty well i think .

comments.author: Litzki1990
comments.body: Quote from: Sun2k on May 02, 2023, 11:32:20 AMHello everyone,When I buy a crypto on the Binance spot market, the % gain/loss and the $ gain/loss amount do not appear like on the future market.Do you know of any application or software that does this by manually entering the purchase price and the amount of crypto purchased?Thank you for your understanding.No matter which app you use you can never know the future market. Because what is going to happen in the future is unknown to everyone. If the future could be known through an app or software then people would not have gained so much knowledge about investment or trading. Always be wary of those people who tell you that they have some app or software that can tell you about the future market, it's a scam. Because no one can tell which direction the market will go.  Market chart observation can be done by taking into account the experience of the candles and the current and past markets to predict which direction the market movement will take. And only experienced people can guess something like that.

The only problem with Coinmarketcap portfolio adding is that you cannot set coin price manually but It will be set automatically with current price some other users mentioned coinstats which is also amazing one and i am using it. Always be wary of those people who tell you that they have some app or software that can tell you about the future market, it's a scam. Because no one can tell which direction the market will go.  Market chart observation can be done by taking into account the experience of the candles and the current and past markets to predict which direction the market movement will take. And only experienced people can guess something like that.I think you wrongly understand the requirement of the OP. He is not looking for an app which tell him about the future's market or predict the price of bitcoin and crypto.  He is looking for an app which he may use to track his portfolio. For example, he buy some coins and sell some coins in loss and profit. He needs an app though which the app automatically track his portfolio and at the same time tell if he is in Net profit or Net loss.There are many app for this purpose, for example Coinmarketcap , blockfolio ,CoinTracking are some commonly used for this purpose. He can try them all and see which interface suits him the best.

comments.author: Honnet43
comments.body: I haven't come across an app that tracks spot market gains and losses manually, but I can tell you that XGo's platform has a range of features that make trading easier, including the ability to earn rewards and connect with other crypto platforms. And also their customer support team is always ready to help out if you encounter any issues.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: On the dashboard of Binance, it tells you how much you've gained or loss but AFAIK that's just like within the 24-hr range period. I don't have this app but looking at Ledger live, it displays you your 24-hour, a week, a month, a year and even ALL of gains and losses since you've started using it. But one requirement of it is to have yourself a Ledger wallet, whether it's the old S or the new X. Either of the two will work as any of them is required for you to have a Ledger live app.

comments.body: Quote from: Sun2k on May 02, 2023, 11:32:20 AMHello everyone,When I buy a crypto on the Binance spot market, the % gain/loss and the $ gain/loss amount do not appear like on the future market.Do you know of any application or software that does this by manually entering the purchase price and the amount of crypto purchased?Thank you for your understanding.I would not advise using any application or software that connects your trading account with the application because it carries risks we do not know about. It's better if you use an application Binance has provided, and it's safer than a third-party one.But if it's just to check the market's state, including the prices of the coins we have, you can use Coinmarketcap, CoinGecko, or Blockfolio. And I guess you can also link it to your trading account, although I don't recommend it.
